headline: GTA Online
subtitle: The Halloween Horrors Continue in GTA Online
content:
Halloween season enters its penultimate week as waves of eerie incentives continue in GTA Online. Make space in your wardrobe for a set of gruesome new masks, as thereâ€™s no better way to signal the oncoming tide of mischief than by dressing in costume.

Don a nightmarish disguise by playing GTA Online to receive the Blue Vintage Werewolf Mask. Also, those who dare deliver Event Cargo from any Business Battle through October 25 will secure the Teal Vintage Zombie Mask.
